description:
At the Law Offices of James M. McClellan, we have 28 years of experience representing and counseling clients in a variety legal matters, including personal injury, workers' compensation, criminal defense, bankruptcy, estate planning, probate administration, social security disability, and family law. We handle issues ranging from auto accidents and DWI defense, to workers' compensation litigation and medical malpractice.

Our success is based on the quality relationship that we maintain with clients. We practice law with integrity and treat our clients with respect for their needs, goals, and objectives. We work hard to get our clients the positive results they deserve. We prepare every case as if it will go to trial. That way, we are ready if a legal disagreement turns into a battle. As Shakespeare wrote: "What my tongue speaks, my right drawn sword may prove." When our clients need it, we will fight to the bitter end. Though we are fierce competitors, our objective is to be approachable and responsive to our clients.

Contact us, today, to schedule an appointment with a Sikeston criminal defense lawyer, personal injury attorney, workers' compensation lawyer, and general practitioner. We can help you with your legal problems.

From our offices in Sikeston, we assist clients from Cape Girardeau, Poplar Bluff, New Madrid, Caruthersville, Benton, Charleston, Bloomfield, Kennett, Perryville, and all over Southeast Missouri.
